00021  * ===  FUNCTION  ======================================================================

00023  *  Description:  
00024  * =====================================================================================

00026 void conn_init_global ( void ){
00027     conn_global = (_conn *)calloc(1, sizeof(_conn));
00028     conn_global->server_ip = "localhost";
00029     conn_global->server_port = 8008;
00030 
00031     conn_global->unix_sock = 0;
00032     conn_global->path = "/tmp/sqlproxy.sock";
00033 
00034     conn_global->pg_host = "localhost";
00035     conn_global->pg_port = 5432;
00036 
00037     conn_global->do_daemonize = 0;
00038     conn_global->pid_file = "/var/run/server.pid";
00039 
00040     conn_global->process_num = 2;
00041 
00042     conn_global->factor = 1.25;
00043     conn_global->maxbytes = 64 * 1024 * 1024 ;
00044 }               /* -----  end of function conn_init_global  ----- */

00053 void conn_get_global (  ){
00054 
00055     conn_global->server_ip = conf_get("server_ip");
00056     conn_global->server_port = atoi(conf_get("server_port"));
00057 
00058     conn_global->unix_sock = atoi(conf_get("unix_sock"));
00059     conn_global->path = conf_get("path");
00060 
00061     conn_global->pg_host = conf_get("pg_host");
00062     conn_global->pg_port = atoi(conf_get("pg_port"));
00063

00065     conn_global->pid_file = conf_get("pid_file");
